sentence.Network_en: He told her she was a liar, whereupon she walked out.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对她说她在说谎，她便愤然而去。

sentence.Network_en: He saw me coming, whereupon he offered me his seat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看到我进来, 便把他的座位让给了我.

sentence.Network_en: He insulted her, whereupon she slapped him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他侮辱她, 于是她给了他一巴掌.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 模具机械专用词汇|各类常用英语词汇 ... well line 结合线 whereupon 于是 winding 绕,卷.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(W1)|无忧教育 ... whereunto 向何处 whereupon 因此 wherever 无论那里.
英文好的人进来看看~关于连词的问题_百度知道 ... whereby, 凭什么, 为何 whereupon, 在什么上面 whereas, 然而; 鉴于; 反之.
自考英语阅读词汇... ... unshaven a. not shaved 不剃须的 whereupon ad. immediately after that 因此，于是 Adam‘s apple 喉结.

list.abs: whereupon the little boat turned her nose once more down wind .于是小船转过船头，再次背着风。
the application tries to read some data , whereupon the system sends you an IRP . your dispatch routine puts the IRP in a queue and returns .这个应用事这读取一些数据，因此系统发给你一个irp。你的分配程序把这个irp反进一个队列并返回。
whereupon everyone assembled in the courtroom sat down .法庭里的人跟着也坐下来。
industrial society's foundational economic resources are machines , whereupon chattel law takes the core position of land law .工业社会的基础经济资源是机器，于是动产法取代了土地法的核心地位。

entry.def: You use whereupon to say that one thing happens immediately after another thing, and usually as a result of it.

example.ex: Mr Muite refused to talk to them except in the company of his legal colleagues, whereupon the police officers departed...
example.tran: 缪特先生拒绝在没有其律师同事陪同的情况下和他们说话，于是警察们就离开了。

example.ex: 'Well, get on with it then,' said Dobson, whereupon Davies started to explain.
example.tran: “那好吧，继续吧，”多布森说，于是戴维斯开始解释。

means.word_mean: 1. closely following and in consequence of which;

sentences.sentence: "the Japanese refused to import U.S. made cellular phones whereupon the U.S. imposed strict tariffs on Japanese exports"
"this is a statement whereat the listeners may get angry"

auth_sentence.content: Whereupon the unnamed source sent me an indignant e-mail.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whereupon the unnamed source sent me an indignant e-mail.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whereupon the unnamed source sent me an indignant e-mail.

auth_sentence.content: Whereupon Jacob said, Well, that's very funny!
auth_sentence.res_content: Whereupon Jacob said, Well, that's very funny!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whereupon Jacob said, Well, that's very funny!

auth_sentence.content: He made another joke whereupon they dissolved in relieved laughter.
auth_sentence.res_content: He made another joke whereupon they dissolved in relieved laughter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He made another joke whereupon they dissolved in relieved laughter.

means.word_mean: 在这以后, 然后, 于是

sentences.en: He insulted her, whereupon she slapped him.
